thread.title: Apples mysterious emoji IS an anti-bullying icon Tech giant is supporting the I Am A Witness campaign against online abuse

title: Apples mysterious emoji IS an anti-bullying icon Tech giant is supporting the I Am A Witness campaign against online abuse
text:
Apple's mysterious emoji IS an anti-bullying icon: Tech giant is supporting the I Am A Witness campaign against online abuse 
Daily Mail Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Apple has partnered with a campaign called I Am A Witness to draw attention to abuse and cyberbullying across websites and apps by adding an eye emoji to its keyboard. The emoji, which looks like an eye inside a speech bubble (pictured centre), is also available for Android phones and tablets...
